column1: 3221,"Metal Casting, Forging and Finishing Trades Workers",,"Operate metal forming equipment
column3: Remove accessories, tools or other parts from equipment
column5: Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column7: Manoeuvre work pieces in equipment during production
column9: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements
column11: Trim excess material from work pieces
column13: Place materials into or onto moulds
column19: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column21: Conduct test runs of production equipment
column27: Select production equipment according to product specifications
column29: Set equipment guides, stops, spacers or other fixtures
